lines.text: It would answer the riddle, wouldn't it? Remote-controlled creatures, their brains powered by atomic energy, roaming the streets, directed from a central point.
Steigg, you may be a crackpot, but you're also a genius.

[about her new doll]
I'm going to call her Dave.
Dave? Dave's a boy's name, that's a girl doll.
I don't care... I know, I'll tell all my friends she's a tomboy.
Dr. Steigg, if it weren't for my money, you'd be experimenting with cats and dogs in that flea-sized lab of yours in Europe.
Doctor, how did anybody break through those bars in there?
Maybe he ate all his vitamins.

[after his wife has asked if it is all right to leave their 6 year old daughter playing alone outside while monsters are murdering people in the streets]
There seems to be some sort of definite pattern. Can't put my finger on it, but I do know that Hennessey and McGraw were killed for a reason.
Well, for a while. I don't think they've gotten around to indiscriminate killings yet.

[on TV broadcast]
As Governor, I am declaring a state of emergency. all police facilities have been alerted to prevent any further crimes by so-called atomic creatures.
Steigg, you may be a crackpot, but you are also a genius!
